song_name: His Name Is Legs (Ladies and Gentleman)
metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, His Name Is Legs (Ladies and Gentleman) is significantly more complex than the typical song, having above average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
